message:
SYSTEM: Dev8d_summary.pdf: Página 14
Cloud Workshop
• Workshop about how to use Amazon EC2 (and 
Linode demo)
• What is Amazon EC2 + features
• Elastic computing
• AMIs = ISOs in Amazon
• Cons: is like a live CD, 78$ per month (to just run an 
instance)
• Static (moveable) IPs, you can assign your won DNS
• Persistent storage through an EBS volume (S3 mounted as 
a volume)
• How to 
• start a new machine
• deploy services in it
• access this machine
• save data in the Amazon cloud
speaker: SYSTEM
